lead_paragraph: Real estate mogul Donald Trump vowed on Tuesday to turn a towering Washington landmark into one of the world's top luxury hotels, part of a rejuvenation of the U.S. capital's downtown.

headline.main: Trump Outlines Plans for Luxury Hotel in Washington Landmark
headline.print_headline: Trump Outlines Plans for Luxury Hotel in Washington Landmark

snippet: Real estate mogul Donald Trump vowed on Tuesday to turn a towering Washington landmark into one of the world's top luxury hotels, part of a rejuvenation of the U.S. capital's downtown....
